subject: Hockey, Ice
Citizens Bank Park (Philadelphia, Pa)
lead_paragraph: Bernie Parent, the great Flyers goalie of the 1970s, made several excellent stops in the Flyers alumni’s 3-1 victory against the Rangers at Citizens Bank Park.
snippet: Bernie Parent, the great Flyers goalie of the 1970s, made several excellent stops in the Flyers alumni’s 3-1 victory against the Rangers at Citizens Bank Park.
